sourcesContent:
<template>
  <sweet-game-cell
    v-for="(shape, index) in playerSequence"
    :key="index"
    :shape="shape"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { onMounted, onUpdated } from "vue";
import SweetGameCell from "@/components/SweetGameCell.vue";

export default {
  name: "SweetGameCells",
  components: { SweetGameCell },
  props: ["sequenceToFind"],
  setup(props) {
    let playerSequence = Aref(null);

    function resetPlayerSequence() {
      playerSequence = Array.apply(
        null,
        Array(props.sequenceToFind.length)
      ).map(() => 0);
    }

    onMounted(() => {
      console.log("GAME CELLS : ", playerSequence, props.sequenceToFind.length);
      for (const cell in playerSequence) {
        console.log("hello");
      }
    });

    onUpdated(() => {
      console.log("GAME CELLS : ", playerSequence, props.sequenceToFind.length);
      playerSequence = Array.apply(
        null,
        Array(props.sequenceToFind.length)
      ).map(() => 0);

      for (const cell in playerSequence) {
        console.log("hello");
      }
    });

    return { playerSequence };
  },
};
</script>
